Chapters

Generator

This class writes the actual PHP and HTML code for a given form description.

Summary
Generator
This class writes the actual PHP and HTML code for a given form description.
Properties
$formDesc
A DescParser instance to parse the form descriptions.
$compiledDesc
An array containing information of a single parsed form description
$opts
An associative array with options for controlling output
$names
An array with values that are used in processing PHP templates
$validations
An array of Statements that set error flags if validations fail Property: $postAssigns An array of Statements that copy the form data to the internal data array, only if the condition for the inputs are met.
$isEditForm
Indicates that the current form is a form to edit existing instances of the defined object.
Functions
__construct
applyVars
A callback function that replaces PHP template variables.
applyConditions
A callback function that filters out code in PHP templates based on conditions.
processPHPTemplate
Takes a PHP template and processes it to produce a proper PHP file.
getErrorStmt
Generates the statements to set error flags.
getErrorStmt
Generates the statements to assign submitted data to the internal data array.
setFile
Sets the form description file to parse.
setOpts
Changes the value of options.
compileFiles
Processes a form description and writes out the generated files.
formatFile
Replaces the %O, %o, %A and %a placeholders for action file names.
compileFile
Generates files for the description of a single form.
Properties
$visID
A counter that is used to generate unique IDs for HTML nodes that have no id already assigned.
$jsVars
An array of variables used in processing the JavaScript template.
Functions
processJSTemplate
Processes a JavaScript template file.
getJavascript
Returns the block of javascript code for this form.
getVisibilityStatements
Returns JavaScript statements to show/hide or enable/disable parts of the form based on conditions in the form.
assignOnChange
Updates the change events for inputs.
collectDependencies
Determines which inputs are depended on by the conditions in the form.
getExprDeps
Determines which inputs are depended on by an Expression.
getErrorClearStatements
Returns JavaScript code that hides all error statements.
getValidationStatements
Returns JavaScript code that validates the form and shows errors if necessary.

Properties

$formDesc

A DescParser instance to parse the form descriptions.

$compiledDesc

An array containing information of a single parsed form description

$opts

An associative array with options for controlling output

$names

An array with values that are used in processing PHP templates

$validations

An array of Statements that set error flags if validations fail Property: $postAssigns An array of Statements that copy the form data to the internal data array, only if the condition for the inputs are met.

$isEditForm

Indicates that the current form is a form to edit existing instances of the defined object.  Property: $isListForm Indicates that the current form is a form to list a selection of instances of the defined object.

Functions

__construct

public function __construct($opts)

Parameters

$optsAn associative array setting the options for the generator.

Options

The valid options are:

classDirThe directory relative to the form file where class files will be written.
classNameThe name of the generated classes.  The filenames are based on this as well.
htmlDirThe directory relative to the form file where HTML files will be written.
htmlHeadDirThe directory relative to the form file where HTML header files will be written.  If not specified, the header will be written in the normal HTML file.
actionDirThe directory relative to the form file where action files will be written.
actionFilesAn array of files that perform display and/or actions.  The key is the name of the PHP template file, the value is the name of the generated file.
templateDirThe directory where the PHP templates can be found.

The generated filenames classFile and actionFiles have a few format specifiers:

%OThe object name as specified in a form template.
%oThe object name with the first letter converted to lowercase.
%AThe action name starting with a capital.
%aThe action name starting with a lowercase letter.

applyVars

public function applyVars($match)

A callback function that replaces PHP template variables.  Do not call directly, it is only public because callbacks need to be public.

applyConditions

public function applyConditions($match)

A callback function that filters out code in PHP templates based on conditions.  Do not call directly, it is only public because callbacks need to be public.

processPHPTemplate

protected function processPHPTemplate($phpTemplate,
$outputFile)

Takes a PHP template and processes it to produce a proper PHP file.

Parameters

$phpTemplateThe filename of the template to process.
$outputFileThe filename to write the result to.

getErrorStmt

public function getErrorStmt(HTMLInput $node)

Generates the statements to set error flags.  Do not call directly.  This is a callback function for HTMLNode::getConditionalStmt.

getErrorStmt

Generates the statements to assign submitted data to the internal data array.  Do not call directly.  This is a callback function for HTMLNode::getConditionalStmt.

setFile

public function setFile($filename)

Sets the form description file to parse.

setOpts

public function setOpts($opts)

Changes the value of options.  See __construct for valid options and their meanings.

compileFiles

public function compileFiles()

Processes a form description and writes out the generated files.

formatFile

private function formatFile($filename,
$action)

Replaces the %O, %o, %A and %a placeholders for action file names.

Parameters

$filenameThe filename to format.
$actionThe value for the $a placeholder.

Returns

The formatted filename.

compileFile

protected function compileFile($form,
$action)

Generates files for the description of a single form.

Parameters

$formThe name of the form description
$actionThe name of the action performed by the form

Properties

$visID

A counter that is used to generate unique IDs for HTML nodes that have no id already assigned.

$jsVars

An array of variables used in processing the JavaScript template.

Functions

processJSTemplate

protected function processJSTemplate($jsTemplate)

Processes a JavaScript template file.

Parameters

$jsTemplateThe name of the template file.

Returns

A string with the processed javascript.

getJavascript

protected function getJavascript(HTMLTag $node)

Returns the block of javascript code for this form.

Parameters

$nodeThe base HTML node to generate JavaScript for

Returns

A string with Smarty escaped javascript code.

getVisibilityStatements

protected function getVisibilityStatements(HTMLTag $node)

Returns JavaScript statements to show/hide or enable/disable parts of the form based on conditions in the form.

Parameters

$nodeThe HTML node to process

Returns

A string of javascript code.

assignOnChange

protected function assignOnChange(HTMLTag $node,
array $dependencies)

Updates the change events for inputs.  If conditions depend on an input, then when that input changes it must call the JavaScript function to update visibility or enable/disable inputs.

Parameters

$nodeThe node to process.
$dependenciesAn array of dependencies as output by collectDependencies.

collectDependencies

protected function collectDependencies(HTMLTag $node)

Determines which inputs are depended on by the conditions in the form.

Parameters

$nodeThe node to process.

Returns

An array with names of inputs that are depended on.

getExprDeps

protected function getExprDeps(Expression $ex)

Determines which inputs are depended on by an Expression.

Parameters

$exThe expression to process.

Returns

An array with names of inputs that are depended on.

getErrorClearStatements

protected function getErrorClearStatements()

Returns JavaScript code that hides all error statements.

getValidationStatements

protected function getValidationStatements()

Returns JavaScript code that validates the form and shows errors if necessary.
